videos.title: Flume feat. MAY-A - Say Nothing (2022)
videos.description: The music video for "Say Nothing" by Flume featuring MAY-A, directed by Michael Hili, offers a visually captivating and surreal experience. It includes psychedelic visuals, with Flume donning a bleach-blonde hairstyle and posing on motorcycles, while MAY-A is seen submerged in black sand. The video uses stark contrasts and vibrant colors to complement the song's themes of post-relationship clarity and emotional expression. This trippy and avant-garde style enhances the song's narrative, making it a standout piece in Flume's discography.
videos.additional_info:
Flume feat. MAY-A - Say Nothing (2022)

It includes psychedelic visuals, with Flume donning a bleach-blonde hairstyle and posing on motorcycles, while MAY-A is seen submerged in black sand. The video uses stark contrasts and vibrant colors to complement the song's themes of post-relationship clarity and emotional expression. This trippy and avant-garde style enhances the song's narrative, making it a standout piece in Flume's discography.

videos.title: Offset - CODE ft. Moneybagg Yo (2022)
videos.description: The music video for "CODE" by Offset featuring Moneybagg Yo is visually striking and matches the energy and themes of the song. In the video, both artists perform in various gritty, urban settings, enhancing the tough and assertive lyrics of the track. The video features scenes with luxury cars, dynamic group performances, and visually engaging effects that emphasize the rhythm and mood of the music. The overall aesthetic is dark and stylish, with a focus on street fashion and a portrayal of a lavish lifestyle, which is common in hip hop videos. The video complements the song's themes of success, power, and street credibility.
videos.additional_info:
Offset - CODE ft. Moneybagg Yo (2022)

In the video, both artists perform in various gritty, urban settings, enhancing the tough and assertive lyrics of the track. The video features scenes with luxury cars, dynamic group performances, and visually engaging effects that emphasize the rhythm and mood of the music. The overall aesthetic is dark and stylish, with a focus on street fashion and a portrayal of a lavish lifestyle, which is common in hip hop videos. The video complements the song's themes of success, power, and street credibility.

Director - Claire Arnold
DOP - Taylor McIntosh
Editor - Anthony Miralles

videos.title: 21 Savage - redrum (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Redrum" by 21 Savage, featured on his album "American Dream," is directed by Danny Seth and showcases a return to the artist's roots in London. It contrasts iconic landmarks with the grittier areas of Brixton, symbolizing the song's themes. The track itself, produced by London on da Track, samples "Serenata do Adeus" and incorporates elements from "The Shining," including the famous line "Here's Johnny!" Despite some opinions that the video could have more directly referenced "The Shining's" iconic scenes, it has been well-received for its artistic representation and Savage's performance.
videos.additional_info:
21 Savage - redrum (2024)
The music video for "Redrum" by 21 Savage, featured on his album "American Dream," is directed by Danny Seth and showcases a return to the artist's roots in London. It contrasts iconic landmarks with the grittier areas of Brixton, symbolizing the song's themes. The track itself, produced by London on da Track, samples "Serenata do Adeus" and incorporates elements from "The Shining," including the famous line "Here's Johnny!" Despite some opinions that the video could have more directly referenced "The Shining's" iconic scenes, it has been well-received for its artistic representation and Savage's performance.

DOP - Chewy Lodge, JAWMIDNIGHT, Thomas Marchese

videos.title: Busta Rhymes - BIG EVERYTHING (2023)
videos.description: The 2023 music video for "BIG EVERYTHING" by Busta Rhymes, featuring DaBaby and T-Pain, showcases a dynamic collaboration among these artists. The video is part of Busta Rhymes' promotional efforts for his album "Blockbusta." In this collaboration, Busta Rhymes and DaBaby exchange verses over a beat reminiscent of classic hip-hop, with T-Pain adding his distinctive vocals to the mix. The video and song highlight the artists' lyrical prowess and their ability to create an engaging hip-hop track that appeals to fans across different eras of the genre.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Offset - CODE ft. Moneybagg Yo (2022)
videos.description: The music video for "CODE" by Offset featuring Moneybagg Yo is visually striking and matches the energy and themes of the song. In the video, both artists perform in various gritty, urban settings, enhancing the tough and assertive lyrics of the track. The video features scenes with luxury cars, dynamic group performances, and visually engaging effects that emphasize the rhythm and mood of the music. The overall aesthetic is dark and stylish, with a focus on street fashion and a portrayal of a lavish lifestyle, which is common in hip hop videos. The video complements the song's themes of success, power, and street credibility.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Flume feat. MAY-A - Say Nothing (2022)
videos.description: The music video for "Say Nothing" by Flume featuring MAY-A, directed by Michael Hili, offers a visually captivating and surreal experience. It includes psychedelic visuals, with Flume donning a bleach-blonde hairstyle and posing on motorcycles, while MAY-A is seen submerged in black sand. The video uses stark contrasts and vibrant colors to complement the song's themes of post-relationship clarity and emotional expression. This trippy and avant-garde style enhances the song's narrative, making it a standout piece in Flume's discography.
videos.additional_info:
